mapper.select:
SELECT id, report_id, report_name, report_type, report_type_name, report_desc, report_principal, report_notice_type, email_server_id, email_subject, email_consignee, email_cc, body, send_time, send_result FROM tb_quality_report_log WHERE del_flag = 1 AND report_id=#{reportId}
AND report_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR email_subject LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR send_time LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR send_result LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
